attributes.additional_details:
The horror coming out of Syria must be stopped. I urge the Government to use physical action now instead of verbal action as this falls on deaf ears.

Countless innocent men, women and even children are being murdered for naught. These children are Syria's FUTURE!

We ask that the Government also insists that the USA, Turkey, France, Russia, Germany, Egypt and Saudi Arabia also head international pleas and take appropriate action!

SAVE SYRIA! SAVE THE INNOCENT! THINK OF THE CHILDREN!
